comment: Really, really liked this class a bunch. Right from the first day you knew it was going to be a good class. Not an easy class, but a good one. I came out feeling much more prepared for college writing than before, now I know how to create my argument and use good logic in my papers. I heart Ms. Z!
Awesome class and professor. Wasn't easy in the beginning but I learned ALOT and was not bored out of my mind while learning it. She is so straight forward it is AWESOME, and very amusing.
This is one of the BEST professors I have ever had! The first day of class I was honestly terrified... But I decided to stay in the class and I'm so glad I did!

not an interesting class by any means but reqired. very high school level work but she grades harder than expected. shes very helpful and its not a hard class. recommend for easy grade, just boring class.
I love her! She was so helpful and was very clear about what she wanted. I never have gotten an A on a college paper till this class. Just have to attend class and listen and you will be fine!

This professor will go out of her way to help you. She is very funny and sweet, but she grades strictly. If you pay attention to her and what she wants you to do, you will be absolutely fine. She has very helpful peer-review sessions and helps you herself on the final paper. I recommend her definitely.

One of my favorite teachers ever! She is hilarious so she makes the class fun. only 4 papers and they are easy prompts. however, she is a strict grader and has strong preferences! other than that, she is awesome! I'd recommend her. Wish I could take her again!

she was a great teacher. she showed youtube videos and made the class fun. We did get into peer review groups for our papers which helped a lot. We only had four papers and they were good prompts. I liked this class.

she is the greatest english teacher i have ever had. she is really fun and makes english not so terrible. not to mention, she always has some pointless youtube video at the beginning of each class. as long as you show up to class everyday and do decent on the papers youll easily get a B.
Professor Zeiger is so so funny, and she is also a great teacher. You will laugh a lot in this class, and you will learn way more than you expected to, at least I did :o)
Prof. Zeiger is, simply, great. She conveyed the information we needed to know while entertaining us at the same time. This is a fun class and also a very educational one. A+

Ms. Zeiger is an AWESOME teacher than any student would be lucky to have. She is smart and kind and funny and always seems to have the answer but won't make you feel stupid for asking a question. I learned so much from her <3<3<333
Loved her, class was not easy but not too hard either. She is super energetic and also very intelligent. Teaches you how to really research, very practical lessons for a General Education class.
I had Ms. Zeiger last Fall and she taught me so much about writing. I followed her to be in her class again this semester, and it is so far so good. Ms. Zeiger is an amazing professor, that is all.
